item.title: DC-1 of DC Series(vulnhub)
item.description: Let’s root DC-1! Details can be found at https://www.five86.com/dc-1.html Open this to see the box's overview pulled from the above website. DC-1 is a purposely built vulnerable lab for the purpose of gaining experience in the world of penetration testing. It was designed to be a challenge for beginners, but just how easy it is will depend on your skills and knowledge, and your ability to learn. To successfully complete this challenge, you will require Linux skills, familiarity with the Linux command line and experience with basic penetration testing tools, such as the tools that can be found on Kali Linux, or Parrot Security OS.
item.dc:creator: Matt Raupfer
